region: Region name to provision, ex: us-east-1
availability_zone_1: The first availability zone, eg: us-east-1a
availability_zone_2: The second availability zone, eg: us-east-1b
subnet_priv_1a: The first private subnet id [us-east-1a], eg: subnet-00000000
subnet_priv_1a_cidr: The CIDR of the above subnet, eg: 10.10.2.0/24
subnet_priv_1b: The second private subnet id [us-east-1b], ex: subnet-00000000
subnet_priv_1b_cidr: The CIDR of the above subnet, eg: 10.10.3.0/24
subnet_pub_1a: The first public subnet id [us-east-1a], eg: subnet-00000000
subnet_pub_1a_cidr: The CIDR of the above subnet, eg: 10.10.0.0/24
subnet_pub_1b: The second public subnet id [us-east-1b], ex: subnet-00000000
subnet_pub_1b_cidr: The CIDR of the above subnet, eg: 10.10.1.0/24
